trans-unit.source: Animates from the <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> value of the previous key frame to its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value*> using discrete interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 从进行动画处理<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>到其自身上一个关键帧的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value*>使用离散内插。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Point> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection>结合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>要进行动画处理<xref:System.Windows.Point>根据一组关键帧的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧定义的一个段<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>它所属。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每个关键帧具有目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>指定的时间关键帧的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A>应到达。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧动画应用到其自己的目标值的上一个关键帧的目标值。

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: 它将启动时上一个关键帧结束，并在达到其自己的关键时间时结束。

trans-unit.source: Discrete key frames like DiscretePointKeyFrame create sudden "jumps" between values (no Interpolation).
trans-unit.target: 离散的关键帧，与 DiscretePointKeyFrame 突变""值 （无内插）。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the animated property does not change until the key frame's key time is reached at which point the animated property goes suddenly to the target value.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，才在哪个点的属性的基值突然达到目标值到达关键帧的关键时间，也会发生变化的属性的基值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"></xref>使用指定的结束值的类。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 结束关键帧的值 （也称为"目标值"）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"></xref>类指定的结束值和关键时间。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 结束关键帧的值 （也称为"目标值"）。

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的关键时间。

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: 关键时间确定时也关键帧的结束时达到目标值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscretePointKeyFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Uses discrete interpolation to transition between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame.
trans-unit.target: 使用离散内的插在上一个关键帧值和当前关键帧值之间进行切换。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 动画起始值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 介于 0.0 和 1.0，（含)，该值指定此关键帧已经过去的时间的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 此关键帧的输出值给定了指定的基值和进度。
